stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  CARING  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Very relaxed and great class. Some of the papers require a bit, but start them right away, she gives you 2-3 weeks usually. She also understands when you need to miss class for an emergency. I was in a wreck on the way to class and she didn\'t count it as an unexcused absence. Easy A if you actually do the papers.

stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  SO MANY PAPERS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: She was an interesting professor but at the end of the day she grades super easy (my class was honors and I received an easy A) as long as you show you put in any amount of effort.

comments: Mary is a great professor, and if you don\'t get an A in her class you simply aren\'t trying. 99% of her assignments are effort and completion. All the rough drafts of papers are credit for turning them in on time.

stu_tags: HILARIOUS  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Such a great lady & such an easy class. Get to know her, she\'s a hoot and she really loves her students. She\'s very honest and makes the class interesting. Little assignments that are just a few sentence responses throughout the year and a long paper that you present, but it\'s easy. She\'s amazing, seriously going to miss her a lot. Show up though!

stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Mary was very helpful to me throughout the semester. She assigns due dates for all papers but they are merely suggestions. You turn in a lot of drafts but they don\'t count for a grade. The feedback she gives does help a lot! She emails back quickly and her office hours are great. Required conferences are a big help!

comments: Mary is really awesome. Although her class is alot of writing it is an English class. Antoher bonus is she sometimes brings candy to class.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (3)  Respected (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Mrs. Coyle is by far my favorite professor. Best english teacher there for 101 and 102. You have one 8+ pg research paper due at the end of the semester and little activities during the course as well. Straight forward assignments, just show up to class and do the assignments.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (3)  Respected (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Great professor! She is very nice and will answer any questions that you have. She also has conferences which are very helpful. I felt like I learned a lot in this class and I would recommend this professor to anyone needing to take this class.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (3)  Respected (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: The class work seems a lot more daunting than it is. A research paper is to be written throughout with (seemingly) lengthy requirements but I found nothing is REALLLLLY due until the final portfolio, but if you leave gaps in the writing process actually writing the final paper becomes very difficult. Easy presentation project and there\'s candy!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (3)  Respected (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: If you can, take her class! She is so nice and helpful, and will help you with anything you are struggling with. She proofreads your papers very well, so take her advice and you will be fine. She grades easy as well. Class with her was never a waste of time, and you will appreciate what you learned from her class that will help you in the future.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (3)  Respected (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Mary is fantastic! A little dry at times, but funny if you are paying attention. She also doesn\'t make this class out to be more than it is...a 100 level course! No tests or quizzes, only portfolios. Lots of class participation. She was also supportive of me needing to bring my 7yr old to class!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (3)  Respected (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: I had Mary Coyle for both ENG 101 and 102, and she is by far the best professor I\'ve ever had. Very helpful and clear. Easy A in both classes, but you still learn with her. One on one conferences in her office that you are required to schedule with her especially help.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (3)  Respected (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Great woman! very sweet, she is understanding of personal issues when it comes to class. If you ask her for help, or e-mail her she is always there to help you better your grade. Lets you choose what you write about which that is helpful, and she is very open-minded to your opinions/thoughts on things. :)

comments: Very sweet woman. She is very understanding and makes every effort to tell you how you can improve. If you need help she will make sure you get it. She allows you to choose what you write about for the most part which makes it easier. Highly recommended.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (3)  Respected (2)  Caring (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Very nice and helpful. Understands it\'s a 100 level English class, so the assignments are geared towards preparing you to write in other courses and they definitely helped. You get to miss x days before it starts to hurt your grade. Definitely take her for 101 and 102 if you can.
